title: SEBASTIAN SHAKESPEARE: Carrie Symonds dances the night away at Abba musical
text:
While Boris Johnson's reputed former lover, Jennifer Arcuri, told ITV viewers that he had asked her 'to show him a few things' on the dancing pole at her London flat, the Prime Minister's current girlfriend, Carrie Symonds, prefers more restrained jiving.

I can reveal that Carrie, 31, escaped No 10 Downing Street on Monday night to attend Mamma Mia! The Party at the O2.

As my exclusive picture illustrates, she joined in as the audience danced at the end of the musical.

Carrie Symonds shows off her best dance moves at Mamma Mia! The Party on Monday night

Carrie wore a cream sweater with the slogan Disco Paris, a green Alice band and an emerald polka dot skirt.

'She was in the heart of the action with a group of friends,' a fellow guest tells me.

'At first she seemed quiet and subdued, and was checking her phone constantly, but, by the end of the night, she looked like she was having the time of her life.

'She was on her feet, waving her arms and singing along to Take A Chance On Me.'
description: SEBASTIAN SHAKESPEARE: Boris Johnson's girlfriend Carrie Symonds enjoyed herself by dancing the night away at the Abba musical this week.
authors: Sebastian Shakespeare For The Daily Mail
